channel.title: Joe Kampschmidt's Code
channel.description: a pragmatic approach to web and software development

item.title: Examples of calling an API HTTP GET for JSON in different languages
item.description:
Downloading JSON via GET from a simple API should be the 2nd tutorial right after Hello World for every language. Below is an ever-growing collection of code examples to highlight the differences in different programming languages and serve as a practical reference.

Jump to an implementation:

  • Node.js
  • Javascript<...

item.title: Typescript in the Wild - Real World Examples Part 1
item.description:
In an ongoing series I will be reading and discussing various Typescript code found in the wild. Reading other people's code is a great way to learn and improve your own code. First up is a random class from the popular VS Code editor.

editorAction.ts from github.com/Microsoft/vscode

item.title: Migrating a project to Angular CLI build system
item.description:
I recently migrated an Angular app from a gulp build system to an Angular CLI (version 1.2.6). I am enjoying the new build system and the improved Angular performance. I wanted to share the process, some pain points and lessons learned.

A good starting point for migrating is the angular-cli migration guide and
